name: Subspace Voyage
description:
Travel between bubbles deep in the ocean and gain a fortune to fulfil a contract and retire.

Controls

W/UP: Accelerate
A/LEFT: Rotate Left
D/RIGHT: Rotate Right
SPACE: Fire torpedo
F: Deploy Fishing Lines
E: Collect Resource
M: Show Map

The Story

Oh no! It seems like your loans are not paid and you have been kidnapped!

You must now serve as a Contracted Sub Driver for Subby Corp to repay your loans!

Explore this underwater world and perform necessary tasks such as, trading between the bubble worlds, fishing GODOT FISH, Beat up pirates (or merchants) and achieve your goal to be debt-free, freed(literally) and finally settle down.

Heck why stop there, go and create your own Subspace journey.
